Focus.Description: L.Sword, D.Blade, and S.Axe gauges charge 20% faster while G.Sword, Bow, and Hammer charging time decreased by 20%.

Element Atk Down.Description: Decreases the power of Elemental attacks by 20%. (0.8x normal damage)

Good Luck.Description: Sometimes increases the number of Reward Items received at the end of a Quest. (from 22/32 to 26/32 chance per slot until one failure or maximum number of rewards is reached)

Distraction.Description: L.Sword, D.Blade, and S.Axe gauges charge 20% slower while G.Sword, Bow, and Hammer charging time increased by 20%.

Use Any Pierce S.Description: Allows a bowgun to fire all Pierce S levels.

Doggy Paddler.Description: Decreases your movement speed in water.

Torso Up.Description: Double skill points on torso including all decoration jewels gemmed in.

Critical Draw.Description: Guarantees all draw attacks will be critical.

Olympic Swimmer.Description: Increases your movement speed in water.

Use Any Pellet S.Description: Allows a bowgun to fire all Pellet S levels.

Evasion +1.Description: Increases invulnerability during evasive moves from 0.2 seconds to 0.33 seconds.

Evasion Down.Description: Decreases invulnerability during evasive moves from 0.2 seconds to 0.1 seconds.

Punishing Draw.Description: Grants the ability to stun (KO) and exhaust monsters with draw attacks.

Defense Down (L).Description: Decreases defense by 10% and a minimum 10; cannot decrease defense lower than 1.

Element Atk Up.Description: Increases the power of Elemental attacks by 20%. (1.2x normal damage)

Guard Boost.Description: Causes previously unblockable attacks to become blockable.

Marathon Runner.Description: Slows down Stamina depletion for actions other than evasion and blocking to 1/2 normal speed.

Stam Recov Down.Description: Slows down recovery speed of stamina

Defense Up (L).Description: Increases defense by 7% and a further 25.

Adrenaline +1.Description: Greatly increases Defense when Health is below 40%.

Spectre's Whim.Description: Chance of pickaxe, bug nets, boomerangs, harpoons, and horns breaking is increased by 25%.

Gathering +2.Description: Greatly increases chance of gathering the maximum number of times from 84 to 97%.

Recoil Down +3.Description: Bowgun recoil is reduced even greater

Auto-Guard.Description: Enables ability to automatically block attacks (when blocking is possible).

Capture Guru.Description: Monster icon on the map blinks when monsters are ready to be captured.

Rock Steady.Description: Knockdown effects are reduced, also grants Wind Proof (Lo), Earplugs (also blocks Alatreon roars) and Current Res (Lo).

Fortify.Description: Near death defence increase by 30; After first faint attack multiplied by 1.1. After second faint attack multiplied by 1.2.

Combination Pro.Description: Guarantees maximum possible Combination results with items such as Bowgun ammo.

Defense Down (M).Description: Decreases defense by 5% and a minimum 10; cannot decrease defense lower than 1.

Taunt.Description: Monsters are more likely to target you in a group.

Artillery Expert.Description: Increases damage of Ballista, Cannon, gunlance shots, Wvyern Fire and Crag S.

Thunder Res -20.Description: Thunder resistance -20; turns Thunder Blight from (S) to (L)

Use Lv1 Crag S.Description: Allows a bowgun to fire Crag S Lv1.

Evade Extender.Description: Increases evasion distance by 50%. (1.5x normal distance)

Blunt Edge.Description: Doubles the rate at which your weapon loses Sharpness.

Double Stun.Description: Makes it harder to recover from being stunned.

Use Power Coat.Description: Allows a bow to use power coating

Weakness Exploit.Description: When attacking a monster part with defense higher than 45, damage is increased by 5%.

Honey Hunter.Description: Gathers two Royal Honey and Honey at a time.

Carving Master.Description: Carving Pro and gives 1 extra carve.

Heat Surge.Description: Greatly increases damage incurred from heat

Bad Luck.Description: Sometimes decreases the number of Reward Items received at the end of a Quest. (from 22/32 to 16/32 chance per slot until one failure or maximum number of rewards is reached)

Item Use Down.Description: Decreases the effect time of certain items.

Guts.Description: When health is above 64, hunter will survive a single attack that would cause fainting. Only occurs once unless hunter faints.

Meat Lover.Description: Increases stamina when eating raw meat; has dash juice effect when eating rare meat or well-done meat

Use Para Coat.Description: Allows a bow to use paralysis coating

Adrenaline +2.Description: Greatly increases Attack (1.3x) and Defense (+45) when Health is below 40%.

Divine Whim.Description: Chance of pickaxe, bug nets, boomerangs, harpoons, and horns breaking is reduced by 75%.

Devil's Whim.Description: Chance of pickaxe, bug nets, boomerangs, harpoons, and horns breaking is increased by 50%.

Combination +20%.Description: Increases your combination success rate by 20%

Double Poison.Description: Doubles the damage received from poison.

Halve Stun.Description: Reduces the likelihood of being stunned by 50%.

Normal/Rapid Up.Description: Increases the damage of Normal S/Rapid Bow

Artillery Novice.Description: Slightly increases damage of Ballista, Cannon, gunlance shots, Wvyern Fire and Crag S.

Scavenger.Description: Increases efficiency of items that raise maximum Stamina.

Guard +2.Description: Decrease stamina consumed by blocking by 20, negate guard damage, and knockback by most attacks.

Antiseptic.Description: Allows you to use any item while under stench effect.

Autotracker.Description: Activates Detect without having to mark the monster.

Sneak.Description: Monsters are less likely to target you in a group.

Item Use Up.Description: Increases the effect time of certain items.

Shakalaka Cheer.Description: When Shakalaka(s) is/are recovering underground, use shouts to call him(them) back with full recovery

Dragon Res -20.Description: Dragon resistance -20; turns Dragon Blight from (S) to (L)

Spirit's Whim.Description: Chance of pickaxe, bug nets, boomerangs, harpoons, and horns breaking is reduced by 50%.

Use Slime Coat.Description: Allows a bow to use blast coating

Heat Cancel.Description: Negates all heat as well as damange from lava

Capture Master.Description: Greatly increases capture items in rewards.

Dive Enhancer.Description: Distance traveled when performing running dive away from large monsters is extended and can be performed toward them.

Gathering -1.Description: Decreases chance of gathering the maximum number of times in a location from 84 to 72%.

Short Sprinter.Description: Speeds up Stamina depletion for actions other than evasion and blocking to 1.2x normal speed.

Endless Oxygen.Description: No depletion of the oxygen gauge

Wide-Range +1.Description: Health & status Items used also affect nearby party members for a 1/2 amount. (herbs, potions, and berries only)

Bombardier.Description: Bomb damage is increased to 1.5x normal damage. Bomb Combinations are 100%

Combination +45%.Description: Increases your Combination success rate by 45%.

Speed Eating +2.Description: Increases meat and item consuming speed.

Use Lv1 Pellet S.Description: Allows a bowgun to fire Pellet S Lv1.

Demonic Blessing.Description: 25% chance to take 30% more damage (equivalent to 7.5% damage increase).

Ocean's Blessing.Description: CurrentRes (Hi), Olympic Swimmer and Oxygen Unlimited

Wellness.Description: Prevents Sleep, Poison, Paralysis and Stun

Combination -10%.Description: Decreases your Combination success rate by 10%.

Latent Power +1.Description: After roughly 5 minutes of fighting weapon power and affinity increase for 90 seconds, stamina is also 1/5 at that time.

Anti-Theft.Description: Enemies cannot steal anything from the hunter.

Recovery Down.Description: Health recovery items work at 75% efficiency.

Peak Performance.Description: Increases attack power when health is full

Short Breath.Description: Speeds up depletion of the Oxygen Gauge.

Combination -20%.Description: Decreases your combination success rate by 20%

Use Exhaust Coat.Description: Allows a bow to use exhaust coating

Ice Res -20.Description: Ice resistance -20; turns Ice Blight from (S) to (L)

Constitution +1.Description: Stamina consumption when evading, blocking, and using Switch Axe slash combo is decreased by 25%.

Recoil Down -3.Description: Bowgun recoil is increased even greater

Use Slime S.Description: Allows a bowgun to fire Blast S; adds ammo

Tremor Res.Description: Prevents staggering from tremors created by large monsters.

Flame Aura.Description: Causes monsters to react as if you are carrying a Torch, even when you aren't.

Defense Up (M).Description: Increases defense by 3% and a further 20.

Charm Chaser.Description: Possible to gather two charms at once.

Raise Hunger.Description: Increases maximum Stamina depletion to 1.5x normal speed.

Trap Master.Description: Speeds up trap and bomb setting time. Raises Trap Combinations to 100%

Constitution -2.Description: Stamina consumption when evading, blocking, and using Switch Axe slash combo is decreased by 35%.

Load Up.Description: Increases the loadable amount of all usable ammo by one.

Guard -1.Description: Increase stamina consumed by blocking by 10, increase guard damage, and knockback by most attacks.

Awaken.Description: Releases the latent elemental properties in weapons that don't have elements.

Status Atk +1.Description: Abnormal status attacks potency multiplied by 1.125

Constitution +2.Description: Stamina consumption when evading, blocking, and using Switch Axe slash combo is decreased by 50%.

Carving Pro.Description: Prevents in interruption while carving from attacks with low knockback.

Gathering +1.Description: Increases chance of gathering the maximum number of times in a location from 84 to 91%.

Shakalaka Rally.Description: Increases Shakalaka's Attack (10%) , Defense (10%) and recovery speed

Pro Transporter.Description: Travel faster while carrying eggs or powderstones.

Divine Blessing.Description: 25% chance to take 30% less damage (equivalent to 7.5% damage reduction).

Use Slicing S.Description: Allows a bowgun to fire Slice S; adds ammo

Earplugs.Description: Unaffected by all monster roars besides Elder Dragons, Duramboros, Gigginox, Deviljho, Brachydios and Diablos species.

Windproof (Lo).Description: Negates a certain amount of Wind Pressure.

Current Res (Lo).Description: Negates some of the water currents created by large monsters.

Worrywart.Description: Decreases Defense and Attack (0.7x) when Health is below 40%..

Water Res -20.Description: Water resistance -20; turns Water Blight from (S) to (L)

Latent Power +2.Description: After roughly 5 minutes of fighting weapon power and affinity increase for 90 seconds, stamina is also 1/2 at that time.

Fire Res -20.Description: Fire resistance -20; turns Fire Blight from (S) to (L)

Use Poison Coat.Description: Allows a bow to use poison coating

Use Any Crag S.Description: Allows a bowgun to fire all Crag S levels.

Constitution -1.Description: Stamina consumption when evading, blocking, and using Switch Axe slash combo is increased by 20%.

Use C.Range Coat.Description: Allows a bow to use razor coating

Bonus Shot.Description: Allows one extra shot to be fired while rapid firing.

Use Lv1 Clust S.Description: Allows a bowgun to fire Clust S Lv1.

Pierce/Pierce Up.Description: Increases the damage of Pierce S/Pierce Bow

Horrible Luck.Description: Often decreases the number of Reward Items received at the end of a Quest. (from 22/32 to 8/32 chance per slot until one failure or maximum number of rewards is reached)

Gourmand.Description: Sometimes increases the effeciency of items that raise maximum Stamina.

Guard +1.Description: Decrease stamina consumed by blocking by 10, negate guard damage, and knockback by most attacks.

Evasion +2.Description: Increases invulnerability during evasive moves from 0.2 seconds to 0.4 seconds.

Current Res (Hi).Description: Negates the water currents created by large monster.

Great Luck.Description: Often increases the number of Reward Items received at the end of a Quest. (from 22/32 to 29/32 chance per slot until one failure or maximum number of rewards is reached)

Dung Bomb Expert.Description: Increases Dung Bomb efficiency, and raises their Combo success rate to 100%.

Razor Sharp.Description: Halves the rate at which your weapon loses Sharpness

Pellet/Spread Up.Description: Increases the damage of Pellet S/Scatter Bow

Status Atk Down.Description: Decreases the potency of Abnormal Status attacks by 12.5%. (87.5% normal, but decimal points are dropped) Also increases required tranqs for capture from 2 to 3.

Sharpness +1.Description: Increases your weapon's Sharpness by one level.

Horn Maestro.Description: Reduces likelihood of flute breaks; increases duration of recital effects triggered by hunting horn

Status Atk +2.Description: Abnormal status attacks potency multiplied by 1.25

Partbreaker.Description: Attacks decrease monster part durability 30% faster.

Use Any Normal S.Description: Allows a bowgun to fire all Normal S levels.

Recovery Up.Description: Health recovery items work at 125% efficiency.

Cold Surge.Description: Greatly increase stamina depletion from the cold

Use Lv1 Pierce S.Description: Allows a bowgun to fire Pierce S Lv1.

Use Any Clust S.Description: Allows a bowgun to fire all Clust S levels.

Challenger +2.Description: When staying at the same area as raged big monsters, add Attack Up (L) and Critical Eye + 2.

Mind's Eye.Description: Prevents your attacks from being deflected. Also known as ESP.

Defense Down (S).Description: Decreases defense by 10; cannot decrease defense lower than 1.

Wide-Range +2.Description: Health & status Items used also affect party members. (herbs, potions, and berries only)

Stamina Thief.Description: Increases stamina damage for stamina attacks

Use Sleep Coat.Description: Allows a bow to use sleep coating

Challenger +1.Description: When staying at the same area as raged big monsters, add Attack Up (S) and Critical Eye + 1.

Outdoorsman.Description: Fishing Expert, BBQ Expert, Farsight all in one

Detect.Description: Marked monsters display additional information on the map, such as species.
